name: THERE ARE SPIDERS IN MY TETRIS ROOM ...what?
name_original: THERE ARE SPIDERS IN MY TETRIS ROOM ...what?
description:
THERE ARE SPIDERS IN MY TETRIS ROOM ...what? is an action game developed by Loiuy123 and Kimmyx. It came out on 11-07-2021.
You can play THERE ARE SPIDERS IN MY TETRIS ROOM ...what? on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
